bill_title: Commending and honoring the Lennox School FFA chapter.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring the Lennox School FFA chapter. WHEREAS, the Lennox Sundstrom FFA Chapter traveled to Brookings on April 7, 2019, for the 91st State FFA Convention, where the chapter participated in a career fair as well as a community service project that was sponsored by the State FFA Foundation; and WHEREAS, Sarah Kroeger was selected to serve as 2018-2019 State FFA Vice President and was the first Lennox member to be selected as a State FFA officer since 2011; and WHEREAS, Cooper Benning, Nick Ihnen, Kaleb Lunstra, Jack Nordmann, Sami Nordmann, and Madison Wentz earned the State FFA degree; and WHEREAS, Layne Lunstra, Brock Schroeder, Sami Nordmann, and Kaleb Lunstra were awarded as Dairy Cattle Evaluation CDE champions; and WHEREAS, the Lennox FFA chapter, advised by Jim Wilson, has exhibited exemplary citizenship and leadership in agriculture and continue to make positive impacts on their community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Lennox High School FFA chapter and its members are commended and honored for their work in agricultural leadership.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring the Lennox School FFA chapter. WHEREAS, the Lennox Sundstrom FFA Chapter traveled to Brookings on April 7, 2019, for the 91st State FFA Convention, where the chapter participated in a career fair as well as a community service project that was sponsored by the State FFA Foundation; and WHEREAS, Sarah Kroeger was selected to serve as 2018-2019 State FFA Vice President and was the first Lennox member to be selected as a State FFA officer since 2011; and WHEREAS, Cooper Benning, Nick Ihnen, Kaleb Lunstra, Jack Nordmann, Sami Nordmann, and Madison Wentz earned the State FFA degree; and WHEREAS, Layne Lunstra, Brock Schroeder, Sami Nordmann, and Kaleb Lunstra were awarded as Dairy Cattle Evaluation CDE champions; and WHEREAS, the Lennox FFA chapter, advised by Jim Wilson, has exhibited exemplary citizenship and leadership in agriculture and continue to make positive impacts on their community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Lennox High School FFA chapter and its members are commended and honored for their work in agricultural leadership.
